Package com.xebisco.yield.engine

Class Engine

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.engine.Engine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameHandler
public class Engine extends Object implements Runnable
This class is used to create a game loop.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • update

      public void update(long last, long actual)
      "This function is called every time the game updates." The first parameter, `last`, is the time in milliseconds since the last update. The second parameter, `actual`, is the time in milliseconds the actual frame process began.
      Parameters:
      last - The last time the update method was called.
      actual - The current time in milliseconds.

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Returns true if the thread is running, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The boolean value of the variable running.

    • setRunning

      public void setRunning(boolean running)
      This function sets the value of the running variable to the value of the running parameter.

      The targetTime variable is being returned.

      public void setIgnoreTodo(boolean ignoreTodo)
      > Sets the ignoreTodo flag
      Parameters:

    • isStopOnNext

      public boolean isStopOnNext()
      Returns to value of the stopOnNext variable.
      Returns:
      The value of the stopOnNext variable.

    • setStopOnNext

      public void setStopOnNext(boolean stopOnNext)
      This function sets the value of the stopOnNext variable to the value of the stopOnNext parameter. The stopOnNext variable tells if the game loop will end in the next frame update.
      Parameters:
      stopOnNext - The stopOnNext value to be set.

    • getPaused

      public AtomicBoolean getPaused()
      This function returns the paused variable.
      Returns:
      A reference to the paused object.

    • setPaused

      public void setPaused(AtomicBoolean paused)
      This function sets the paused variable to the value of the paused variable passed in as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      paused - This is an AtomicBoolean object that is used to pause and resume the thread.

    • setPaused

      public void setPaused(boolean paused)
      This function sets the paused variable to the value of the paused variable passed in as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      paused - Will set the AtomicBoolean object that is used to pause and resume the thread.
